Posts.Content: Nov 11, 2009 09:11PM AuroraL wrote: I've only posted a few times, but I've been around the internet.  The moderating here is terrible, and it sounds like there just aren't enough moderators to control things the way they should be controlled. Someone should notify the powers that be and get a few more on board.  This is critical to the people who really need this site.  Bless you all!  (in whatever form works for you)
Posts.Title: Activern Banned goodiedo Moderators
